itemDescription: Scottish and British male curler and coach

wikipedia_page.main:
Russell Keiller is a Scottish curler and curling coach. He is a 1982 European champion and a 1995 World Men's silver medallist. He participated at the 2006 Winter Olympics as a coach of Great Britain women team.
Russell Keiller was appointed by the Board of Directors of British Curling in August 2014.
